field.string: Show request stat on kanban views

div.div: If enabled then users will see request statistics on kanban views of request related models like: Request Type, Request Category, etc

label.string: Automatically create author contacts for requests

div.p: When request created from incoming email or by unregistered user on website, and author is not present in NPS's contacts database, then create new contact (partner) for this email address.
Same bechavior will be applied to requests created on website by unregistered users.

div.div: Select your preferred view type.

label.string: Automatically create CC contacts for requests

div.p: If the checkbox is checked, for any email mentioned in CC header new contact will be created (if not exists yet)
Same bechavior will be applied to requests created on website by unregistered users.

field.name: request_mail_auto_subscribe_cc_contacts
field.string: Auto subscribe CC contacts on mail

div.div: If the checkbox is checked, CC contacts will be automatically subscribed on the specified mail

field.name: group_request_show_searchpanel_view
field.string: Show searchpanel in request search view

div.div: If this group enabled, then users will see searchpanel in request search view
